title: iMac 2017  820-00609 Not turning on
message: I have a 2017 iMac which is not turning on at all. the 4 LED on the motherboard is not turning on at all. I checked it with another power supply but no light or any sign on the logic board. I can see 12.5v or 3.3v on some capacitors so I assume the power supply is fine. Any idea where I should look to?

title: iMac 2017  820-00609 Not turning on
message:
No schematic available; you can use 00134 as guide, being similar in some places.
Taking this one as reference, check if you get 12V_S5_FET voltage at Q8470.
If not, change Q8470.

title: iMac 2017  820-00609 Not turning on
message:

trying to find Q8470 with the 00134 boardview 🤯
Could you please help me to locate it. Here is a photo of the board. Which area should I look for 

[ATTACH type="full"]60182[/ATTACH]

title: iMac 2017  820-00609 Not turning on
message:
There is no other power MOSFET connected with Drain to 12V_G3H (power connector).
You should be able to find it; probably SOP-8, or DFN-8 package.
No sufficient resolution to make an idea in that picture.

Do not quote an entire post, visible few centimeters above.
Any reason to do that?
Please, maintain forum aesthetic...
